CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , the GPE region . He is a former employee of the ORG - controlled ORG “ NORP ” ( “ the ORG , ” ORG “ Південелектромаш ” ) .

CARDINAL . The background facts for the case are described in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) . The circumstances of the present case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG 's labour disputes commission ( “ the Commission , ” комісія з трудових спорів ВАТ “ Південелектромаш “ ) ordered the Company to pay the applicant ORG CARDINAL in salary arrears .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ( “ the Bailiffs , ” PERSON виконавчої служби Новокаховського міського управління юстиції ) initiated the enforcement proceedings for the above decision .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG Новокаховський міський суд PERSON області ) ordered the Company to pay the applicant an additional amount of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . This judgment became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to the Bailiffs .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Bailiffs returned the execution writs in respect of the judgment of DATE to the applicant unenforced . They stated that the judgment could not be enforced for the debtor 's lack of funds . They further advised the applicant of his right to resubmit these writs at any time , but until DATE . On DATE the applicant resubmitted the writs and on DATE the Bailiffs initiated the enforcement proceedings .

CARDINAL . As of DATE , the applicant was no . CARDINAL in the creditors ' waiting list in respect of the enforcement of the ORG 's decision and no . CARDINAL in respect of the enforcement of the court judgment . Both of them remain unenforced to present day .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgments of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) and ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
